personal.name: Owen Howe
personal.title: Professional Summary
about: Soccer, tech, food, and music all the time.

consulting.name: Sycamore Creek Consulting
consulting.tagline: We find the people who aren't looking.
consulting.description: Retained search and talent advisory for specialized technical and executive leadership roles.

experience.title: Manager, Talent Acquisition
highlights: Lead high volume, full-cycle recruitment searches for critical growth teams including Engineering, AI, Product, and the Newsroom in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
Direct the early career program for all non-newsroom divisions, annually recruiting over 45 interns, and architecting a successful conversion pipeline that fills all entry-level positions.
Pioneered recruitment strategies for critical growth initiatives, including the AI Mission and Wirecutter, by designing and executing hiring plans from the ground up with C-Suite & Finance.
Trusted by senior leadership to develop strategic hiring roadmaps, craft targeted hiring processes, and lead cross-functional hiring teams of recruiters, coordinators, and sourcers.
Developed data-driven trackers for hiring teams across NYT to allow for hiring insights and scalable solutions, including a migration from Workday to Greenhouse.

experience.company: Two Six Technologies (Elite Cyber Defense R&D Lab)
experience.title: Sr. Talent Management Specialist
highlights: Led the company's Talent Acquisition team managing 30+ R&D Engineering positions at a time across iCIMS and Greenhouse.
Drove rapid workforce expansion by leading recruitment efforts that resulted in 150+ new hires in two years, doubling the company's workforce and enabling pursuit of new strategic programs.
Specialized in recruiting highly technical talent, with over 80% being software/hardware engineers who work R&D programs spanning Cyber, ML, Mobile & Embedded systems, and Data Privacy.
Implemented sourcing strategies to attract talent ranging from Research Directors to Jr. Engineers.
Led weekly recruitment strategy meetings with Research Directors and VPs to optimize our plan for future hiring needs and manage current openings.
Designed, piloted, and scaled an internship program which doubled the internship class size from the previous year and built a proven pipeline to transition interns to full-time employees.

experience.title: English Teacher
highlights: Taught lessons preparing students for the Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL).

books.title: On the Decay of the Art of Lying
